summary: This document is an email from Jeffrey Epstein to Jes Staley, wishing him good luck on a call and inquiring about his travel plans to London. The email contains a confidentiality notice indicating that the information may be privileged and is intended solely for the recipient.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Epstein is the sender of the email, communicating with Jes Staley.

persons.name: Jes Staley
persons.context: Staley is the recipient of the email, receiving well wishes from Epstein.

connections.description: Epstein and Staley are in communication, indicating a personal or professional relationship.

keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein expresses good luck wishes to Jes Staley for a call.
Epstein inquires about Staley's travel plans to London.
The email contains a confidentiality notice indicating potential attorney-client privilege.
The email is marked as confidential and intended only for the recipient.
